listing.listing_description: This fabulous mountain chalet is situated within Moonlight Basin at Big Sky Resort, about fifty feet from Natawista Run. Part of the Silvertip enclave—named by Architectural Digest among the world's "most beautiful hotel cabins"—the villa offers an exquisite balance of high-end contemporary design and rustic Montana comforts. Ample outdoor living areas include an open-air hot tub, while the superbly appointed interiors feature comfortable living and dining areas, a gourmet kitchen, and top-of-the-line media features. Three spacious and cozy bedrooms plus a kid-friendly bunkroom accommodate families and groups of friends up to ten in size. At extra cost, guests enjoy access to the wonderful amenities at Moonlight Basin Clubhouse, including its Jack Nicklaus Signature golf course.The living room features high ceilings and large windows framing beautiful views of the mountains and forest. A lovely sofa faces the gas fireplace and flat-screen TV, while a glass doors opens to the summer lounge on the deck. The open kitchen features chef-grade appliances and serves a four-person bar and charming dining booth with banquette seating for six. Luminous white walls complement the rich wood accents, designer light features, superb contemporary artwork, and exquisite mountain light.The bedrooms offer generous private havens for downtime and rest. The master suite opens to a balcony and features a king bed and ensuite bathroom with dual vanity and shower. Two queen guestrooms share a bathroom with dual vanity and shower, while the kids' room has two bunk beds (sleeping four) and access to a hallway bathroom with shower. Air conditioning and heating keep you comfortable in all seasons.Natawista Run is just steps away, while the resort's base and town center are easily reachable by car. Walk about a minute to Moonlight Basin Cabin, featuring superb dining, a private outdoor pool, a fitness center, and a championship golf course. The chalet is also within easy reach of Big Sky Golf Course and Spanish Peaks Clubhouse, among numerous other attractions. The West Entrance of Yellowstone is about sixty miles away.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: King's Villa is a golfer's delight outside Scottsdale, Arizona, within easy reach of several renowned courses including Orange Tree, TPC Scottsdale, and Camelback. The home is perfectly designed and equipped for a memorable getaway with friends or family, featuring a private swimming pool, putting green, pool table, gourmet kitchen, and beautiful living and dining areas both indoors and alfresco. High-end media features (including a video game console) and air-conditioned interiors create a comfortable atmosphere for guests of all ages. Four ample bedroom suites plus a kid-friendly bunk room accommodate up to twelve guests.Nestled amid high walls and lush trees, the villa's terrace offers a lovely venue for serene relaxation or festive celebrations. Step into the swimming pool for a refreshing dip and sunbathe under the clear Southwestern skies. Practice your short game on the lush green before enjoying some of the finest courses in the American West. Return to barbeques meals in the cool veranda and joyous nights under the desert stars.The veranda flows gracefully into the villa’s interiors, with glass doors opening to a lovely billiard room and comfy TV den. The luminous kitchen features chef-grade appliances, a farmhouse-modern island, and a window bar opening to the veranda, easily serving both the outdoor and indoor dining tables. The spacious salon beside the dining room is perfect for evening cocktails or late-night movies.The cavernous master bedroom is superbly appointed for a couple, with a king bed, private living area with fireplace and TV, bar area with wine fridge, walk-in closet, and fabulous indoor/outdoor ensuite bathroom. There are two large guestrooms with king beds and a shared bathroom, and a third room with queen bed and access to a hallway bathroom. All are furnished with premium linens and accouterments. The kids' room has two twin-size bunk beds, sleeping four children in all.In addition to extraordinary golf courses, you're within ten to twenty minutes of wonderful hiking trails, superb spas, and myriad sporting opportunities. The cutting-edge art galleries and restaurants of Scottsdale are just eleven miles away.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Ski-chalet style shows off its contemporary side at Spruce Ledge. This newly built Breckenridge townhouse is a modern take on the Colorado mountain lodge, with spacious open-concept interiors and four bedrooms that can accommodate groups of twelve. Perhaps best of all, its location in the exclusive Shock Hill neighborhood is just steps from the BreckConnect gondola.In warmer weather, you can take in views of the neighboring Cucumber Gulch Preserve from a private balcony with a barbecue, gas fireplace and al-fresco hot tub. After a day on the ski slopes, pour refreshments from the wine fridge or wet bar, flip on the cable TV or Sonos sound system, or share photos of your holiday with friends and family at home via Wi-Fi.At the heart of this luxury vacation rental is a stunning great room with vaulted ceilings and picturesque forest views. The L-shaped layout puts the sitting and dining areas on either side and the fully equipped kitchen at the center. Throughout the open-concept space, details such as neutral-toned furnishings, a gas fireplace and marble countertops are both stylish and inviting.Spruce Ledge has two bedrooms with king beds, including a master bedroom with its own gas fireplace, and one bedroom with a queen bed. All three bedrooms have en-suite bathrooms. For larger parties, there’s also a bunk room with two queen bunk beds and access to a hall bathroom.A stay at Spruce Ledge puts you close to the best of the Breckenridge action. The villa is a 6-minute drive from the BreckConnect gondola, the nearest ski run and everything from souvenir shopping to honeymoon-worthy dinners on Main Street in Breckenridge. It’s also less than 10 minutes from sledding and tubing in Carter Park and, for true outdoor enthusiasts, great hiking and cross-country skiing in Cucumber Gulch Preserve.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Skyfall is a stunning example of 1960’s architecture that transcends its era to remain a timeless beacon of luxury. Located in the rugged foothills of the San Jacinto Mountains, in a quiet corner of South Palm Springs, you’ll be treated inspiring mountain and valley views. The villa’s aesthetic is worthy of a James Bond movie and at any moment you’ll expect 007 himself to come striding out.The villa wraps the spacious circular terrace where water from an elevated hot tub cascades down into the pool. The terrace is complete with everything you need to enjoy blissful days under the sun: chaise lounges, a couch and vintage Eero Aarnio fiberglass chairs. During summer months you can cool off in the home’s outdoor misting system, while a circular overhang and freestanding parasols offer relief from the desert heat.The home’s rounded interior complements the pool terrace and boasts sleek, clean lines and modern décor. The great room’s signature floor-to-ceiling windows look out over the pool and beyond to the lights of Palm Springs. Vibrant upholstery and art add flashes of color throughout the home, including the cozy turquoise sofas where you can unwind and chat with guests. You’ll love preparing feasts in the gourmet kitchen. Fully-equipped and featuring an impressive double-oven, the kitchen is anchored around a large center island. Meals can be savored in the formal dining room or poolside at an al fresco table.The large Master suite is found at the North end of the home. It features a King size bed, sectional sofa, flatscreen television and access to a semi-private terrace. Its spa-like en-suite houses a walk-in shower, dual vanities and a beautiful Eero Aarnio Ball Chair. The second Master suite is at the home’s South end. It also contains a King size bed and private en-suite, as well as direct access to the pool terrace. The remaining bedroom is a Queen suite with a private patio. It has access to a well-appointed hallway bathroom.Palm Springs is the perfect destination for those seeking either outdoor adventure or rest and relaxation. The villa is just minutes from downtown, where you’ll find upscale shops, restaurants, spas and nightlife. The Coachella Valley is a golfer’s dream, as it’s home to over 80 courses, amid breathtaking scenery. Hikers of all levels will enjoy trails in the surrounding hills and national parks.Palm Springs Registered Tax Number: 3031Palm Springs City ID: 2598Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Cloud Cabin is a beautiful contemporary villa in Breckenridge. Located at the top of White Cloud Drive less than two miles from BreckExpress Lift, the four-bedroom villa features exquisite mountain-modern design, luxurious indoor and outdoor spaces for relaxation and entertainment, and expansive views of Ten Mile Range and the Breckenridge slopes.The villa's design gives a contemporary interpretation of classic mountain-lodge charm. The interior's main floor features a capacious Great Room illuminated by two-story mountain-view windows. In the sumptuous lounge, the sectional and armchairs of supple leather face the central hearth with fireplace and mounted flat screen TV, perfect for relaxing with family and friends. The kitchen is fully equipped with chef-grade Thermador appliances and an island breakfast bar, while the elegant dining table for eight is ideal for epic feasts. Woven bamboo flooring, exposed wooden beams, and lovely furnishings create an exquisite alpine ambience. Downstairs, the villa's ground floor includes a dozy media room with smart TV.Outside the Great Room, the wrap-around deck features a barbeque grill and outdoor furniture for alfresco dining and relaxation in the mountain air. On the downstairs patio, a hot tub invites you to a delicious soak beneath the towering pines.The villa's four deluxe bedrooms sleep ten. The spacious master suite features a king size bed, fireplace, and ensuite bathroom with stand-alone shower and bath. The first guest room has a queen bed and ensuite bathroom, and opens directly to the patio with hot tub. The other two guestrooms share a hallway bathroom; ne has a queen size bed, while the other has two twins—perfect for kids.Cloud Cabin's location gives you a wonderful balance of secluded privacy and easy access to Breckenridge. The villa is right in Warrior's Mark near Peak 9 and 10, with excellent cross-country skiing and snowshoeing options and access to the Burro Trail for advanced skiers. BreckConnect Gondola is about two miles away, while a little farther on is the Gondola to Peak 8. Copper Mountain is twenty miles away. Kids will love sledding and tubing at Carter Park, while Golfers are in easy reach of Breckenridge Golf Club, six miles away. For evenings on the town, Main Street in Breckenridge is just minutes from your door.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: The Bungalow is a stylish one-bedroom suite in the heart of Park City, located right on Historic Main Street, within a short walk of Town Lift. Ideal for couples or small families, the apartment blends the vintage alpine charm and contemporary sophistication of this Rocky Mountain capital, providing an ideal home base for ski vacations, summer golf getaways, or pilgrimages to the Sundance Film Festival.After a day on the mountain or an evening on the town, the open-plan living area provides lovely setting for sharing downtime with loved-ones. The designer kitchen is fully equipped with Viking and Subzero appliances and includes a breakfast bar for four, while the lounge area features sumptuous furnishings, a Sonos Sound System, and a large, mounted Apple TV. The décor features rustic wood paneling, floors, and ceiling beams and exquisite modernist touches in the light fixtures and hearth. Heating, air conditioning, and a washer/dryer ensure comfort and convenience for all guests.The Bungalow's bedroom features a king bed, walk-in closet, TV, and ensuite bathroom with stand-alone rain shower and tub. There is also a queen-size sofa bed in the living room. The rich wood paneling evokes an idyllic alpine cabin, while comfortable bedding and high-end bathroom fixtures inspire refreshing repose before your next adventure.An elevator leads to the building's lobby, from which the many splendors of Park City unfurl before you. Park Silly Sunday Market is right next door, and Town Lift Plaza is a short walk down Main Street. Skiers can also take a five-minute drive by car or shuttle to the Park City or Deer Valley bases, while golfers are just ten minutes from Park City Golf Course. Public parking is available under the Marriot Hotel (guests are reimbursed for parking costs), and the Park City Transit center is steps away.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Take a quintessential Colorado ski holiday with a modern twist at Pop Art Villa. This ski-in, ski-out luxury property offers unparalleled access to the slopes from its setting in the exclusive Arrabelle at Vail Square, while its spacious interiors and sophisticated style make it a welcoming retreat after a day out in the mountains.Guests of the villa are welcome to use the shared rooftop lap pools and hot tubs, children’s room, fitness center and seasonal outdoor firepits at the Arrabelle at Vail Square. Pop Art also has its own underground parking spot, a furnished private balcony with a barbecue and entertainment options including a TV, Sonos sound system and Wi-Fi.This beautifully appointed vacation rental is laid out around an open-concept great room. Set a beverage on the oversized coffee table and settle into the sofa and chairs by the gas fireplace, catch up with friends and family around the dining table, or perch at the breakfast bar in the fully equipped kitchen for a quick coffee or drink. Throughout the residence, subtle neutral tones and luxe textures are set off by the vibrant art collection for which the home is named.Pop Art Villa has three bedrooms with king beds and en-suite bathrooms, including a master bedroom with borrowed-from-a-honeymoon-suite features such as a jetted bathtub. Like the great room, the bedrooms are furnished in refined contemporary style for a relaxed—and relaxing–vibe.A Vail Valley location puts you in the heart of the action. The villa is less than a 5-minute walk from Lionshead Village, the Born Free express lift and the Eagle Bahn gondola, and less than a 10-minute drive from Vail Village. (There’s also a shuttle available from the Arrabelle to Vail Village.) If you’re visiting outside of ski season, you’ll find several golf courses and the Betty Ford Alpine Gardens just a short drive away.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: You don’t often think of a “downtown” atmosphere when you’re booking a ski vacation, but in Breckenridge, Colorado, the two contrasting environments exist in perfect harmony. With walking access to the shops, restaurants, and nightlife of Main Street and BreckConnect Gondola, you’ll be in the prime location for a day on the slopes and a night on the town. With three bedrooms and accommodations for twelve, Slope View Chalet is perfect for an extended family, or a group of friends on vacation together.The classic ski chalet gets a modern-contemporary update at this stylish vacation rental. It’s still got the raw stone, exposed wood, and warm leather furniture of yesteryear, but with a sleek, minimalistic twist. A vaulted ceiling and two-storey window provides a spacious feel in the open concept living area. Form meets function in the stone fireplace that stretches the entire height of the living room, not only is it beautiful, but it houses both the gas fire and a flat screen television. Flowing onward to the kitchen, you’ll find granite countertops and high-end stainless steel appliances.When dinner’s ready, the formal dining space has an artistic “picnic” style seating arrangement for eight. There’s also space for three more at the kitchen’s breakfast bar, and a barbecue outside on the balcony. Whether you’re feeling like spending more time outside in the hot tub or by the fire pit, or you’d prefer the warmth within, Slope View’s got everything you’ll need to make the most of your exciting ski vacation.If you’re traveling with kids, Carter Park is under a mile from the chalet and it’s perfect for family fun. Spend an afternoon sledding and snow tubing in a picturesque environment, sure to excite the kids and the young at heart. Breckenridge Golf Club is another great way to enjoy the rugged mountain terrain while challenging yourself to a round on their championship eighteen.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: This superb townhome is located at 205 Main Street, an exclusive luxury condo development ideally situated in the heart of Park City, a short walk from Town Lift. The stylish yet cozy vacation rental blends classic alpine elements with sophisticated contemporary design, including a gourmet kitchen, outdoor hot tub, and gorgeous artwork and fixtures. Three bedrooms including a kid-friendly bunkroom form an ideal home base for family mountain vacations in this jewel of the Rockies.The open-plan interior features a spacious salon with a sumptuous sofa facing a stone fireplace. Kindle a fire in the evening and sip hot cocoa or red wine while recounting the day's adventures, and step onto the balcony for a soothing soak in the alfresco spa. Prepare hearty meals in the chef-grade kitchen, relish them around the dining table for eight, and cuddle up in the media room with your favorite shows and films. The villa's exquisite décor blends rustic wood accents, luminous white finishes, and exquisite artwork that harmonizes modernist style with indigenous patterns, evoking both the timeless traditions and cutting-edge culture of Park City.All three bedroom suites feature air conditioning and ensuite bathrooms, two with jetted tubs. The master suite includes a king bed, walk-in closet, and sitting area, while the primary guest suite includes a queen bed and private balcony. The charming bunk room offers two twin-size beds (sleeping four in all).With its balance of serenity and convenience, there is hardly a finer location in Park City than 205 Main Street. You can easily walk to Town Lift Plaza to access the extraordinary slopes and trails of Park City Mountain Resort, or drive about five minutes to the resort base (the vacation rental includes two underground parking spots). Deer Valley and Park City Golf Course are also a short drive away, while the heart of Historic Main Street is just steps down the road.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Perched above the fourth green of Jack Nicklaus’ Beaver Course at Breckenridge Golf Club, Speyside Fairway offers its guests scenic mountain views, spacious common areas, and a stylish atmosphere that will elevate your next Luxury Retreats Ski Vacation. Located three minutes from the course, and ten minutes from Main Street and the BrekConnect Gondola, Speyside maintains a high level of privacy without sacrificing its proximity to Breckenridge’s most exciting attractions.WIth four luxurious bedrooms, an open concept great room, and plenty of comfortable seating for the whole group, Speyside is perfect for family vacations or getaways with friends. The traditional vibe of a ski lodge isn’t lost on this trendy villa, its embraced and updated to meet the high standards of the most discerning modern luxury travelers. Only the finest electronics, appliances, fixtures, and finishes have gone into Speyside, and whether you’re planning a social night with friends or a quiet movie night with the family, you’re sure to appreciate the villa’s impressive ambiance.Speyside Fairway is outfitted with a state of the art kitchen that features restaurant caliber appliances, gorgeous granite countertops, and a breakfast bar that invites a social atmosphere, even when preparing meals. After dinner, gather around the fireplace or post up at the wet bar to recount tales of an exciting day on the mountain. Outside, fire pit and hot tub are great places to relax, warm up, and enjoy the view.Downtown Breckenridge is a hotspot for exciting mountain nightlife, with a wide range of restaurants, bars, live music venues, and nightclubs, all year-round. If you’re vacationing in the warmer months, you’ll find World-class golf, hiking, mountain biking, and rock climbing in Summit County. In the winter, it’s all about skiing. WIthin thirty-kilometers, you’ll be able to visit the slopes of Breckenridge Ski Resort, Copper Mountain, Keystone, and Vail.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: It’s all in the name at The View. This glorious Big Sky retreat delivers stunning panoramas from beautifully designed indoor and outdoor living areas. In the summer, use this vacation rental as a base to get out and explore Montana; in the winter, take advantage of ski-in, ski-out access to make first tracks.Look out over Lone Peak from a furnished deck with al-fresco dining for ten and a private hot tub. After a day on the slopes, leave gear in the ski storage area and unwind with the help of the TV and Wi-Fi or cozy up to the gas fireplace. The villa is heated and has laundry facilities, but for summer visitors, air conditioning is not available.Oversized windows bring The View into the open-concept great room of this luxury property, so you can watch the light move across the slopes of the mountains while curled up in the sitting area or swapping stories with friends and family around the dining table. The fully equipped kitchen is open to the rest of the room and features a convenient breakfast bar.The villa has three bedrooms with king beds and en-suite bathrooms, including a master suite with a fireplace and its own balcony. There’s also one bedroom with a queen bed, twin bunk bed, kitchenette and shared access to a hall bathroom that could be used by parents and children or a couple wanting honeymoon-style privacy. For larger parties, there’s an office space with a queen sofa bed and shared access to a hall bathroom.No matter what time of year your holiday, you’ll find plenty to see and do in the Mountain Village area around the villa. When there’s snow on the ground, you can ski in and out to the White Otter lift; otherwise, it’s a short drive to a nearby clubhouse, golf course and the breathtaking Ousel Falls.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Make the views from Sunset Cliffs your own at Villa Bermuda Beach. This stunning spot is known for its surf break and sunsets, and makes an incredible setting for a relaxed getaway or destination wedding—or the honeymoon after. The villa showcases the postcard-worthy panorama in nearly every room, and can accommodate up to six friends and family members in its three bedrooms.This luxury property opens to a deck built right on the rocky cliffs that features sunny lounging areas, an umbrella-shaded dining table, a barbecue and a private oceanfront hot tub. Rinse off in the al-fresco shower before heading inside to relax in front of the cable TV or share photos of your holiday via Wi-Fi.Inside Villa Bermuda Beach, the seaside location shows up in yacht-style wood paneling, beach-inspired artwork and, of course, the wall of nearly floor-to-ceiling windows and doors that opens the great room to the front deck (plus a second courtyard-style deck tucked away from the ocean). Take a seat on the sofa and chairs in front of the fireplace and TV or at the breakfast bar, or whip up a meal from fresh California produce in the fully equipped kitchen.This vacation rental boasts three bedrooms with king beds: one master bedroom with an en-suite bathroom, and two bedrooms that share a bathroom. Like the main living areas, the bedrooms are bright, beachy and modern, with warm wood paneling, serene neutral bedding and the occasional pop of color in a playful area rug.With Bermuda Beach less than five minutes away and Ocean Beach with its cafés and shops just over 1 mile away, you may not want to leave the Beaches neighborhood during your stay. But a short drive into central San Diego of less than 10 miles will bring you to attractions like the charming Gaslamp Quarter, the well-preserved Old Town historic park and even the San Diego Zoo.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Turn your ski holiday to best advantage at the beautifully appointed, conveniently located Vickery's Vantage. This sleek five-bedroom Highlands home boasts a spacious open-concept layout with incredible mountain views, all in a setting only 10 minutes from downtown Breckenridge and a short drive from the gondola. Invite up to sixteen guests for a mountain getaway with friends or a relaxed break with extended family.In warmer weather, savor the views from expansive outdoor living areas with a barbecue, firepit and a honeymoon-worthy hot tub under the stars. If you've been out on the slopes, leave gear in the mud room, stretch out in the exercise room, test your skill at the pool table or unwind in the media room with refreshments from the wet bar. Other entertainment options include a Sonos sound system and Wi-Fi.A mix of large open-plan spaces and quieter nooks makes it easy to gather as a group or steal a moment for a nap in this luxury home. The heart of Vickery's Vantage is a stunning great room with vaulted ceilings and panoramic views of the Colorado landscape, where you can cozy up to a wood-burning fireplace in the sitting area, turn out a gourmet meal in the fully equipped kitchen and seat twelve around the dining table.The villa has two bedrooms with king beds and private en-suite bathrooms, two bedrooms with queen beds and shared access to a hall bathroom, and one bedroom with an extra-large twin bunk bed plus two twin-over-queen bunk beds-the perfect place for kids to giggle themselves to sleep. The bunk room also has shared access to a hall bathroom.With a location in the exclusive Highlands community, this vacation rental puts you about 10 minutes from the BreckConnect gondola and the shops and restaurants in downtown Breckenridge. For more choice in runs, make the short drive to the Breckenridge Ski Resort base or Copper Mountain Ski Resort; for an afternoon off from skiing, head to Carter Park and go sledding or tubing instead.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Modern Oasis is a stunning example of the mid-century modern design that turned a once sleepy town into the desert playground of the rich and famous. The spacious three-bedroom home is located in the much-coveted Las Palmas neighborhood and has been thoughtfully reinterpreted to meet the high standards of today’s discerning guests. The home’s sharp angles and its tall, verdant privacy hedges stand out against a rugged backdrop of the San Jacinto Mountains.Stellar indoor and outdoor amenities are seamlessly integrated and compete for your attention. Verdant grass connects the many conversation areas around the pool terrace. A long covered patio shelters an al fresco dining table and living room set. Cool off with a dip in the pool before laying in a hammock or chaise longue to resume work on your tan. A custom wet bar and barbecue provide a cozy venue for preparing a holiday feast. As dusk settles, head for the bubbling grotto spa which fits up to twelve people.Enter the home through any of the floor-to-ceiling sliding glass door and you’ll encounter spacious, bright rooms with cool, natural stone floors and exposed wood beam ceilings. A lively minimalist-chic aesthetic is applied in the great room. The living room is anchored by a stacked stone fire place. Enjoy films and premium cable on the flatscreen television while you relax on a modern sectional sofa. Perfect your culinary skills in the gourmet kitchen as you prepare memorable meals on high-end appliances. Guests can watch you work from the breakfast bar before dinner is served in the formal dining room.The Master suite is found in a tranquil corner of the villa. It houses a California King size bed, entertainment unit and a well-appointed en-suite spa. The Master suite also leads out to a private patio with an in-ground spa; perfect for moonlight soaks. The second and third bedrooms are also large and well lit. They feature ample closet space and share a bathroom with a combination shower/soak tub.Palm Springs is the perfect destination for those seeking outdoor adventure or rest and relaxation. The villa is just blocks from downtown, where you’ll find upscale shops, restaurants and nightlife. The Coachella Valley is a golfer’s dream, as it’s home to over 80 courses, amid breathtaking scenery. Hikers of all levels will enjoy trails in the surrounding hills and national parks.Palm Springs Registered Tax Number: 3031Palm Springs City ID: 1495Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Plan your Arizona holiday in a home custom-built for entertaining at Cholla. Its thoughtfully designed outdoor areas, finely detailed interiors and six bedrooms make this Scottsdale vacation rental perfect for a desert getaway or family gathering with groups of up to twelve. Spend your stay relaxing at this luxury property or taking advantage of several nearby golf courses.Cholla's outdoor living spaces have everything you'll need to enjoy the hot, sunny days and cooler evenings, from a pool surrounded by sun loungers, covered patio and high-pressure mist system to a barbecue, living and dining areas with an al-fresco fireplace, and a hot tub.Vaulted ceilings, pale wood floors crafted from Siberian oak and neutral tones give the villa's interiors an airy yet refined appeal. The heart of the residence is an open-plan great room with a sitting area, fully equipped kitchen, breakfast bar and breakfast nook, all connected to the terrace. A separate formal dining area has its own bar area, and a separate media room is a more intimate space to watch TV or a movie.There are five bedrooms in the main house at Cholla: three with king beds and private en-suite bathrooms, one with two double beds and access to a hall bathroom, and one with a twin bunk bed. The property also has a separate guest house that's the perfect in-law retreat, family suite or even honeymoon-style escape, with a queen bed, twin bunk bed, and a full kitchen and living area.With its sunny skies and array of challenging courses, Scottsdale is the ideal place to lower your handicap-and with four courses within a 10-mile drive of Cholla, it's easy. Practice a different kind of swing at the nearby Camelback Village Racquet and Health Club or take a hike through Echo Canyon Recreation Area. For shopping, dining and more, make the short drive to downtown Scottsdale or take a day trip into Phoenix.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Live the quintessential Palm Springs experience at La Paloma Palms. Nestled in the highly sought after neighborhood of Vista Las Palmas, this four-bedroom villa is one of the mid-century modern masterpieces known to locals as an Alexander house. Originally constructed in 1960, La Paloma has been redefined to modern standards of luxury and its West-facing orientation presents stunning views of the San Jacinto Mountains.The villa’s outdoor spaces have the feel of a five-star resort. The sleek saline pool has both an integrated tanning shelf and spa tub. Bronze yourself under the California sun from the comfort of colorful chaise longues, or raise a sheltering parasol when the sun reaches its peak. A covered patio demonstrated the seamless integration of indoor and outdoor living. There you’ll find a living room set, perfect for easy afternoons with a book, plus a barbecue and wet bar for preparing dinner al fresco under the stars.The interior displays hallmark features of Alexander homes, including open-plan rooms, clean lines, exposed wood beam ceilings and bright, airy rooms. You and your guests will enjoy unforgettable feasts in the dining room with a unique, triple panel sliding glass door facing the pool and mountains. A gas fireplace creates a cozy ambiance in the living room where you can watch movies or premium cable on a flat screen television. Test your culinary skills in the Chef’s kitchen where state-of-the-art appliances and smooth surfaces make cooking a pleasure.Three of La Paloma’s bedrooms are found in the main house. The Master suite occupies a quiet corner. Within its spacious walls you’ll find a California King size bed, minimalist-chic décor, ample storage solutions and a large en-suite. It also opens out to a private patio. The second and third bedrooms are well-appointed with flatscreen televisions and custom blackout window treatments. The final bedroom is located in a charming, self-contained casita with kitchenette and seating area. It also houses a spa-quality en-suite.When you’re ready to explore, you can start with easy walks around the neighborhood, marveling at the local architecture. The villa is a quick drive to historic Palm Canyon Drive, known as the Palm Springs “strip”. It’s lined with a diverse mix of shops, restaurants and galleries. If you’ve come to relax, you’ll find numerous world class spas nearby, while golfers can spend memorable days teeing off on the lush fairways of world-class courses.Palm Springs Registered Tax Number: 3031Palm Springs City ID: 2308Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Put yourself only steps from the slopes at Argentiere 341. Part of the Chateau Chamonix complex, this newly renovated vacation rental offers ski-in, ski-out access to the Steamboat gondola and is within easy reach of shared amenities. Its open-plan living area and three spacious bedrooms are perfect for a getaway with friends or a relaxed family holiday in Steamboat Springs.Guests of Argentiere 341 are welcome to use the shared pool, hot tub, barbecues and fitness center at Chateau Chamonix, as well as the communal ski storage. For quiet evenings in after a day on the slopes, the villa has its own private space with a TV, Wi-Fi and a cozy fireplace.Vaulted ceilings and large windows give the villa’s open-plan great room a bright, airy feel, while a stone fireplace surround is a dramatic focal point. Stretch out on the sectional in front of the TV, seat up to eight around the dining table to relive the day’s adventures, or pause for a quick snack at the breakfast bar in the fully equipped gourmet kitchen.There are two bedrooms with en-suite bathrooms at this luxury property: a master suite with a king bed and its own balcony, and a second bedroom with a queen bed. The third bedroom has two twin beds and shared access to a hall bathroom.Not only does Argentiere 341 offer ski-in, ski-out access to the Steamboat gondola, but a shuttle service is included during all winter stays, making it easy to get to the slopes—or your après-ski activities. In warmer weather, make the 5-minute trip for a round at Rollingstone Ranch Golf Course. Be sure to leave time to visit some of Colorado’s natural wonders: the family-friendly Steamboat Springs Old Town, or the honeymoon-worthy hot springs in Strawberry Park.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Welcome to five-star living at Cawha Chalet! With custom craftsmanship, you’ll be dazzled upon entrance. Breckenridge started as a mining town and is now a popular ski resort in Summit County. Part of the Rocky Mountains, the area provides some great opportunities for winter sports enthusiasts and, with lovely summertime activities, also makes a great destination for a family holiday year round.This home has everything you could want to make your stay unforgettable. After a day on the slopes, you can saunter back to your chalet, where you can relax and unwind in the private outdoor hot tub with amazing views. For the athletes in the group, Cawha Chalet also features a exercise room with a small flat screen television! The main living space boasts a gorgeous living area with high ceilings, a beautiful stone gas fireplace, hardwood floors, a flat screen television and elegant furnishings.Douglas Fir beams throughout the home give it an elegant, rustic feel. The gourmet kitchen is any chef’s dream with granite countertops and stainless steel appliances, and there is even a breakfast bar! Not in the mood to cook? Then grill something succulent on the outdoor gas barbeque. The dining area, where there is room for twelve, is surrounded by windows showcasing the mountainous views for you and all your guests to marvel.For privacy and space, Cawha Chalet comes equipped with an individual bathroom for each bedroom. This high-end home can sleep up to thirteen guests with three kings, two twins, one bunk bed and one captain’s bunk (twin over double). To relax after a long day on the slopes, indulge in the fabulous king-sized bed in the master suite and soothe your tired muscles in the two-person shower or jet tub.With all sorts of mountain activities including skiing, snowboarding, snowshoeing, hiking, and many more, your adventure options are endless year-round. Walking distance from the Snowflake Lift and 4 O’clock Ski Run, you’re only steps away from perhaps the best skiing in the world. The Cawha Chalet is a beautiful luxury home that is a must-see and a must-book! Whether you are bringing the family, coming for a work retreat or just enjoying the lap of luxury with friends, this Colorado chalet is sure to provide the dream mountain holiday you always wanted.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Located in the heart of one of the most desirable neighborhoods in Breckenridge is Highwoods at Shockhill. Part of the Shock Hill Landing development, luxury, comfort and convenience will draw you to this exceptional, newly constructed property. Warmer months provide stellar golf and hiking opportunities in Colorado, while the winters bring skis, snowboards and rosy cheeks. Keep on the lookout for lovely birds or the fleeting glimpse of a fox darting into the woods as you navigate the incredible natural scenery around you!The spacious open layout of the main floor is the perfect place to entertain or just relax and watch television, read a book or listen to music on the surround sound system. The incredible views from the deck invite you to take it easy on the patio chairs or fire up some steaks on the gas grill. After the day’s activities, entertainment for children can be found in the den with games to play or movies to watch from the 200+ film library. Step onto the patio and sit under the stars while you soak in the hot tub or warm up around the fire pit.Built with native natural accents, reclaimed wood floors and high end amenities, this private vacation rental provides everything you need for a wonderful alpine holiday. The fully-stocked gourmet kitchen features stainless steel appliances, granite countertops and an eat-in counter. High ceilings and huge windows allow much natural sunlight to enter the home throughout the day.Four exquisite bedrooms and some additional bedding accommodate up to twelve guests at this holiday chalet. With a master king suite, two king bedroom suites, a bunk bedroom and a sleeper sofa, there is something for everyone in your group. Highwoods at Shockhill makes a great bet for a family vacation or an unforgettable alpine honeymoon.Only steps from the Gondola Mid-Station, guests will have quick access to the ski slopes as well as the dining, shopping and nightlife of Main Street. If it is Nordic skiing or hiking you desire, endless trails are right outside your front door. In the fall, the Breckenridge Oktoberfest sprawls into Main Street and welcomes live music, dancing and food for a cultural experience during your stay. Get the mountain sojourn you have earned with Luxury Retreats!Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: This beautiful estate is nestled amid the Alexander Valley AVA in Sonoma County, just outside the town of Healdsburg and close to numerous renowned wineries. The vintage ranch house is ideal for a memorable getaway with loved ones, featuring a private outdoor swimming pool, beautiful alfresco living and dining areas, and luminous, superbly appointed interiors (including a gourmet kitchen and home office). Three ample bedrooms accommodate families, destination wedding guests, and groups of friends up to six in size.The estate offers a serene haven for carefree relaxation and festive delights in the heart California Wine Country. Enjoy long days and evenings on the pool terrace, swimming in the refreshing water, basking in the sun, and gathering in the lounge areas with glasses of local wine. Fire up the barbecue grill on the deck in the evening, and relish an alfresco meal at the table for eight.The interiors possess the quintessential Sonoma balance of rustic spirit and a welcoming, modern elegance. The open-concept living and dining room features a comfy lounge with large TV, a sitting area by the fireplace, and a beautiful table for six. Cooks will adore the bright and airy kitchen, with ample prep space, an island breakfast bar, top-of-the-line appliances, and a farmhouse-style table. Excellent media features include Apple TV and Sonos sound. Central air conditioning and heating keep you comfortable in all seasons.The bedrooms are furnished with an uncluttered simplicity, featuring comfortable bedding, serene natural light, and evocative touches of artwork and décor. The master bedroom includes a king bed and a spacious bathroom with dual vanity, walk-in shower, and lovely clawfoot soaking tub. There is one guest suite with a king bed and one with a queen; both enjoy ensuite bathrooms, and the queen suite opens to a private, screened-in terrace.The Healdsburg area includes three renowned wine producing AVAs—Alexander Valley, Russian River, and Dry Creek—and several of the top wineries in North America. You're also an easy drive to Santa Rosa, featuring fabulous cultural attractions, restaurants, and markets. The beaches at Bodega Bay are within comfortable driving distance.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: The views sweep from the Hollywood sign across downtown L.A. to the Pacific at the breathtakingly modern Beech Knoll. Featured in several magazines and on the AWE television network, this stunning three-bedroom vacation rental is just as memorable for its interiors as for its surroundings. Use this West Hollywood Hills luxury villa as a stylish private getaway, or as a base to shop, dine and sightsee on a holiday in greater Los Angeles.Recently renovated by a tech entrepreneur, Beech Knoll has an array of thoughtful smart-home touches, from touch-screen panels for entertainment and lighting and a house-wide sound system to window shades that can automatically lower in strong sunlight. Start your day with a cup just the way you like it from the espresso machine, and end the evening with a glass from the wine fridge, sipped by the gas fireplace. Take in the panoramic views and enjoy the California sun from multiple balconies set with inviting lounge furniture.The villa’s bright, modern interiors have landed it features on the Curbed real estate blog and in the Robb Report, a spot on Dwell magazine’s L.A. house tour, and a segment on AWE television’s Behind the Gates. Not only do large windows on all three levels of the house showcase the incredible views, but sliding glass walls let you open the indoor living spaces to the outdoor ones. Though the open-plan living and dining room and fully equipped Bulthaup kitchen are clean-lined and sleek, reclaimed wood and contemporary art are warm touches of texture and whimsical personality.The master bedroom at Beech Knoll has features worthy of a honeymoon suite, from a king bed and stand-alone bathtub overlooking the city to an en-suite bathroom, private balcony and steam room. The other two bedrooms have queen beds and open to balconies; one has an en-suite bathroom and the other shares access to a hall bathroom.Set on a quiet road just off the Sunset Strip, Beech Knoll offers both privacy and convenience. Guests are just a short drive from shopping on Rodeo Drive and at The Grove, concerts at the iconic Hollywood Bowl, the challenging Wilson & Harding Golf Course and the one-of-a-kind art collection at the Getty Center. Take a beach day in Santa Monica, Venice Beach or Malibu. If you’re traveling with family, the younger set will love a day trip to nearby Universal Studios or Disneyland.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Cozy up just outside downtown Breckenridge at Brooks Hill Hideaway. Tucked away in a grove of pines, this charming five-bedroom vacation rental offers a quiet respite for up to fourteen friends or family members. But despite its secluded location, it’s a 10-minute drive or less from skiing, plus shopping and dining in the town’s historic center.In the summer, return from a day of hiking or biking to heat up the barbecue and linger outside under the heat lamps. In the winter, watch the snow fall on the forest while soaking in the private al-fresco hot tub. Inside, you’ll find equally inviting amenities from a cable TV and Wi-Fi to a gas fireplace.This luxury villa is a modern take on the mountain chalet, with a bright, open-concept great room at its center. The sitting area is laid out around a welcoming stone fireplace, and a breakfast bar in the fully equipped kitchen is the perfect spot to sit for a chat. You can also plan the next day’s adventures around one of two dining tables in the space, or let the kids watch a movie in the separate media room while the grown-ups catch up.Brooks Hill Hideaway has two bedrooms with king beds and en-suite bathrooms, including a master bedroom with honeymoon-suite-worthy features such as a jetted tub. Two other bedrooms have a queen bed and double bed, respectively, and share a bathroom. The fifth bedroom is a bunk room with a twin-over-double bunk bed and a trundle bed.If your Colorado holiday is focused on skiing, you’ll appreciate being just an 8-minute drive from the BreckConnect gondola and a 10-minute drive from the base of Breckenridge Ski Resort. And if not, you’ll enjoy being less than a 10-minute drive from shops, restaurants and the Breckenridge National Historic District.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Ski-in, ski-out access, a location close to Park City’s historic downtown and cozy modern interiors will have you applauding Mountain Symphony. One of the few homes with slopeside access to Park City Mountain Resort, this luxury Utah vacation rental makes it easy to enjoy a ski holiday with up to nine family or friends.At the end of a day on the slopes, glide up to the house, leave your gear in the ski storage area and indulge in a soak in the private hot tub on the terrace, curl up by the gas fireplace, put a movie on the large projector screen or challenge other guests on the video game systems. In warmer months, enjoy the mountain views from the terrace while you wait for the barbecue to heat up, then serve drinks around the firepit while you watch the stars come out.The great room of Mountain Symphony brings together country influences and modern style in harmony, with a vaulted ceiling, exposed beams, hardwood floors and large windows. In the sitting area, a soft sectional, cognac-hued leather chairs and a stone fireplace are a cozy grouping, with a vintage pair of skis adding a rustic note. The formal dining area in the center of the room seats six in appetite-whetting red chairs, and there’s more seating at the breakfast bar in the adjacent fully equipped kitchen.Mountain Symphony has one bedroom with a king bed and en-suite bathroom, and two bedrooms that share a bathroom with a queen bed and bunk bed, respectively. Larger parties can also use the twin bed and trundle bed in the den, which has an adjoining bathroom, for extra accommodations.From the villa’s location on the playfully named Quit’N Time run at the Park City Mountain Resort, it’s just seconds to the nearest ski slope, a 5-minute walk to the Town Lift chairlift and a 5-minute drive to Deer Valley Resort. Make the 2-minute walk to Park City’s Main Street for an evening of shopping or a romantic, honeymoon-worthy dinner out, or the 5-minute walk to the town’s Sunday market. Take a break from skiing with an afternoon of skating at the local ice arena, marvel over a visit to Utah Olympic Park and, in warm weather, play a round or two at Park City Golf Club. When it’s time to leave, plan on a 38-mile drive from Mountain Symphony to the airport in Salt Lake City.

listing.listing_description: Ideal for family vacations and groups of friends, Sunrise Ski Haus is a modern 4-bedroom mountain home pocketed away in Christie Heights, one of Breckenridge’s premier neighborhoods. The Breckenridge Connect Gondola is under a mile from the villa and will whisk you away to Peaks 7 and 8 or down to the Main Street where you’ll discover a rich selection of restaurants, bars, shops and local festivities.Sunrise Ski Haus has been built to take full advantage of its elevated position and alpine setting. Natural wood, stone and marble blend seamlessly into the forested surroundings and large picture windows and vaulted ceilings accentuate the magnificent views over Baldy Mountain and Breckenridge Town. Like the pine-scented air, the décor is clean and fresh and families with teenagers and adult children will appreciate the split-level living areas.An impressive ground floor living space is at the heart of this welcoming home and adjoins the granite-topped professional kitchen with its 4-burner stove and griddle. The open-plan ground floor is a great spot for mingling, discussing the day’s adventures over dinner around the 10-seater dining table or stretching out on the leather sofa with your iPad or the latest bestseller. In the evenings your party might like to gather around the fire and watch a movie here on the flat-screen television or head downstairs to the more private living room which enjoys its own extra-large television screen, wet bar and feature fireplace. An outdoor patio with private hot tub, fire pit and gas grill is the perfect spot for unwinding after a day spent hiking or skiing in the mountains.Fresh air tends to make you sleepy and you’ll be grateful that there are plenty of comfortable bedrooms at Sunrise. Plush king-size beds are ready to settle you into a deep slumber in the Master bedrooms on the main and lower levels and both rooms are served by deluxe en-suite bathrooms. Bedroom One is resplendent with a stand-alone tub and shower, while Bedroom Two has a shower and access to the patio. There’s a queen and twin bed in the third bedroom and a bathroom shared with Bedroom Four which is great for kids with its two twin bunk beds. All rooms have televisions.Ski slopes surround you in this neck of the woods, and you are less than a mile from access to them, but if you prefer to explore the area by car there’s a 2-car garage within the property. The nearest airports are Leadville (45 miles) and Denver International (105 miles).Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Rushing water and classic Colorado scenery are the backdrop to a relaxed ski holiday at River Song at the Shores. Look out at valley views from this contemporary Breckenridge vacation rental—and walk to a shuttle stop, recreation trail and private access to a ski run. Three bedrooms have room for nine friends and family out for mountain fun together.Listen to the river running past from a private patio with a barbecue, firepit, hot tub and, in the summer, an al-fresco dining area. If you’ve spent the day on the slopes, cozy up with the help of the media room, gas fireplace, wine fridge, cable TV and Wi-Fi, or prep gear for the next day’s adventures with the help of the laundry facilities.Natural textures and bright, airy spaces give the villa an ambience of inviting mountain luxury. Stone and wood lend warmth to the open-concept great room, while oversized windows and vaulted ceilings bring in plenty of light. The L-shaped space features a sitting area, a fully equipped kitchen with a breakfast bar and a dining area for eight.Each of the three bedrooms at River Song has a king bed. Two of the bedrooms have en-suite bathrooms and TVs, including a honeymoon-worthy master suite with its own gas fireplace, and the third bedroom shares access to a hall bathroom.River Song is a 4-minute walk from the 4 O’Clock ski run, which guests can enter via private access, and a 5-minute walk from the Summit Stage shuttle bus service, which puts the best of Breckenridge within easy reach. It’s also easy to access the Breckenridge-to-Dillon recreation trail from the entrance to The Shores community. If you’re driving, it’s only 3 miles to the shops, restaurants and activities in charming downtown Breckenridge.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Hatari Lodge is a custom luxury home located in the coveted Shock Hill neighborhood of Breckenridge. This outstanding Colorado chalet offers contemporary elegance alongside rustic mountain style. Perfect for a ski holiday or a summer retreat into nature, Hatari Lodge is also just a few minutes from the shopping, nightlife and restaurants of downtown Breckenridge.Whether you want to have a barbeque or just relax and stargaze, Hatari Lodge has got you covered outdoors. Later on in the day, while the adults convivially enjoy some après-ski banter, the children can head upstairs to relax in the tiered theater seats to watch a movie or play video games in the impressive media room. At the end of the night, everyone will want to gather on the patio around the fire pit for smores or a soak in the hot tub while taking in the breathtaking views. This stunning vacation rental also features a red felt billiard table and a wet bar – perfect for the consummate entertainer in your entourage!Walnut floors are complemented by vaulted ceilings constructed with massive timber beams and trusses throughout the main floor of this incredible private property with panoramic views in every direction. The main level boasts a spacious entertaining area and a gourmet kitchen that features top-of-the-line appliances, granite countertops, three sinks, a butler’s pantry and a breakfast bar. The adjacent formal dining area opens to a balcony.Five stunning bedrooms decked out in quintessential lodge decor accommodate up to twelve guests at this non-smoking villa. All of the bedrooms include en-suite bathrooms and televisions. You will find king beds in four suites and two twin bunk beds in the fifth. Both master suites offer rain showers and dual vanities. You will also find a jetted tub, walk-in closet and fireplace in one of the master bedrooms.The Shock Hill neighborhood is just a three minute walk to the Gondola Mid Station. From here, guests of Hatari Lodge can take a short ride to the lifts at Peaks 7 and 8 or continue riding it all the way to town. Nordic skiers will be pleased to know that cross-country skiing trails abound in this fabulous location. The Breckenridge Golf Club is also just a few minutes away. Get the alpine holiday you deserve with Luxury Retreats!Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Sitting just a block away from Main Street, this contemporary villa in Park City is a cozy retreat for ski getaways and is one of our top Utah vacation rentals. Park City is considered one of North America’s top alpine ski resorts and is a frequent host of international ski competitions.After a day on the slopes, head back for a soak under the stars in the outdoor hot tub. Once you’ve dried off, relax with a movie in the theater room; it features a comfy L-shaped sofa and a large projector screen. This villa also boasts a heated one-car garage, included WiFi and during winter season there’s a daily complimentary towel and amenity service.This newly constructed, 2,350-square-foot home exudes an inviting, open-concept space. The living room is done in soft grey and white tones with silver accent pieces and stylish furnishings surrounding a gas fireplace. Meanwhile, natural light pours in through multiple windows, the skylight and glass doors that open up to a balcony. Nearby, the kitchen is equally bright and comes fully equipped with modern appliances and a center island with a breakfast bar.There are three individually decorated bedrooms in this home. The master suite has a king size bed as well as a sitting area next to a fireplace with a flatscreen television and access to a patio. A second room includes two twin beds, while a third offers a double size bed.You’ll be conveniently close to the town ski lift at Park City Mountain Resort—just a five minute walk. This home is also located close to Main Street where you’ll find diverse shopping, dining and nightlife options.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Live it up in the heart of the metropolis with a stay in this artistic and fashionable penthouse. Nestled amongst towering skyscrapers, take advantage of great access to the entertainment district, before returning in style to huge living spaces, tall columns, sunny roof terrace and a sublime pool. Downtown, LA Live, the Convention Centre, and the Staples Center are just a short walk away.Entering this opulent surrounds of Sky Penthouse, the first thing that strikes guests is the huge 17 foot windows that provide an incredible view of the city streets below. The second aspect will be the sheer luxury and sense of space in the penthouse, with vertical columns increasing the size feel, while fine furniture, spotless kitchen and reclining area all occupy the central section. Relax over breakfast on the shaded and quiet terrace, before moving to the second outdoor area, the sunny pool patio which offers sweet refreshment from the California heat. An impressive outdoor seating area is at your disposal, complete with host-with-the-most barbecue, plus a touch of rustic charm via the outdoor firepit. Explore the complex’s other fine amenities, and make the most of the supplied spa, plus that LA must-have; a fully-equipped exercise center.Guests could not ask for a better location when it comes to staying in LA proper. For business trips, the LA Convention Centre, as well as that commercial hub, LA Live, are less than 10-minute walk away. Plunge into the major cultural institutions, such as the LA County Museum of Art. This highly central location ensures you can visit all the best aspects of this global city via short drive, from the famous beaches and sunny climes of Santa Monica, to the strips and landmarks of Hollywood, Sky Penthouse provides the perfect balance of both location and next-level comfort.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: A bohemian-modern retreat steps from downtown Palm Springs, Hinshaw Hideaway is the former winter escape of JCW and Wilberta Hinshaw, developers of the historic La Plaza shopping center. Built in 1934, the sprawling 3-bedroom, 3.5-bath ranch sits on landscaped grounds in the Movie Colony district, a 10-minute stroll from restaurants, galleries, and shopping. Styled in a mix of mid-century modern and Renaissance-era decor with modern technology throughout. Hinshaw Hideaway is an eclectic escape that invites relaxation. The home opens onto a cozy sitting area with a velvet ottomon facing a decorative fireplace, a unique church pew bench, and a stained-glass window. A colorful stained-glass chandelier hangs above a 6-seat dining table. Just off this room is a fully-equipped kitchen designed for entertaining, featuring stainless steel appliances, marble countertops and a wine fridge. Beyond the living area is a light-filled living room, which opens onto the expansive outdoor patio through sliding doors. On one end, a full-length leather sofa and two Herman Eames chairs, accented by fur, face a chic, glass-topped wet bar crafted with a natural finish and a live edge. A turntable sets the scene for entertaining. For the real entertainment, however, just step outside. A resort-style, heated swimming pool lies at the center of an impressive, South-facing backyard lined with palm trees and surrounded by a lush, 10-foot privacy wall. Soak in the sun in one of the cozy loungers along one end of the pool, or catch up with friends around on cushioned sitting area around a stone fireplace along the other. In a separate corner, a hot tub with 18 jets faces a second stone outdoor fireplace and outdoor bar area. Three more sitting areas surround the pool to provide ample room for entertaining, including a 6-seat dining table. With a BBQ grill and 6-seat outdoor dining table, you can easily enjoy dinner al fresco. Between three spacious bedrooms, Hinshaw Hideaway comfortably sleeps up to 6 guests. Each bedroom, located in a separate corner of the home for privacy, features a Casper Wave mattress and Casper pillows. The master suite, located off the East end of the living area, is styled in rustic, mid-century decor with wood-paneled walls, a king-sized bed and a leather lounge chair. This room also has a 55” flat-screen TV and a luxurious bathroom with marble walls and a soaker tub. The suite opens onto the backyard through glass doors, steps from a cushioned sitting area shaded by umbrellas. The second bedroom, located in the Southwest corner, is styled in eclectic decor with a stained glass door, and unique built-in desk. This bedroom has a Queen size bed and ensuite bath with a walk-in shower. The third bedroom, located on the Northwest corner, is whimsically styled with a four-post, king-sized bed, a Southwestern-style sofa and a decorative vintage TV. This room also has an ensuite bath and walk-in shower. A sliding glass door leads to the backyard. For added convenience, this home also features a private washer and dryer and an additional half-bath. A spacious driveway with charging station provides room for up to 3 cars, giving you the freedom to explore the surrounding desert, including Joshua Tree, located less than an hour away. Of course, with the restaurants, shops, galleries and parks of downtown Palm Springs opening a world of entertainment options for every mood a 10-minute stroll away, you can spend your vacation car-free. Walk to Wellness Park and meditate in the garden, wander through antique stores, or find an open tennis court at Ruth Hardy Park. Palm Springs City ID # 3458

listing.listing_description: Located in the heart of downtown Ketchum, this stylish new building enjoys instant walking access to the city’s vibrant Main Street. As well, Kneebone Penthouse is situated just one block from the free shuttle to Sun Valley Ski Resort, so it’s easy to get around without a vehicle if your group decides to split up for the day. If you’re vacationing in the warmer months, Ketchum is also home to some excellent golf and exciting outdoor activities like hiking, rock climbing, and mountain biking.Newly built, this industrial-chic apartment spares no expense when it comes to mountain village luxury. You’ll love lounging on plush designer furniture as you gaze out the floor-to-ceiling windows onto soaring mountain views. Return home each day to a roaring fire, warm wood tones, and stylish, modern decor. When it’s time to retire for the evening, your group of up to six will have either a king or queen sized bed and a lavishly adorned en-suite to enjoy, all with views of the village and distant mountain range.Kneebone Penthouse comes with a fully equipped, modern kitchen with a social breakfast bar, and formal dining area. Guests will appreciate the state of the art appliances and electronics found throughout the villa, as well as Wi-Fi, cable television, and central air conditioning. In the summer months, Kneebone expands its hosting space out the balcony and rooftop patio, decorated with outdoor furniture, a bocce court, and spectacular mountain views.Sun Valley and Dollar Mountain ski resorts are both located within a five-minute drive of the penthouse, so you’ll have no trouble hitting the slopes bright and early each morning. After a long day on the slopes, refresh and rejuvenate at Frenchman’s Bend Hot Spring, a favorite hangout among locals and vacationers alike. In the evening, Ketchum is home to lots of great restaurants, ranging from casual pubs to fine French, Italian, and American dining. If you’d prefer something a little more laid-back, check the show listings at the Magic Lantern Cinema or pop into Whiskey Jacque’s to check out some live music and a great selection of drinks.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Stay in a mountainside haven of mid-century cool at Peak View Place. Part of the exclusive Home Run Trail development, this luxury townhouse offers ski-in, ski-out access to Northstar California Resort. Its three bedrooms and chic interiors are perfect for a winter getaway to Lake Tahoe with family or a group of friends.This vacation rental has its own furnished outdoor living areas with a hot tub, barbecue and firepit, where you can while away summer evenings or indulge in a soak after a day of skiing. Inside, you’ll find an Apple TV, Wi-Fi, a gas fireplace and a wine cooler, as well as conveniences from laundry facilities to heating and air conditioning.Floor-to-ceiling glass frames the views of mountains and forest in the open-concept great room. Watch TV in mod style in a sofa and lounge chair inspired by mid-century classics in the sitting area, or take a seat at the breakfast bar in the fully equipped kitchen. A wall of cabinetry and matching wood floors give the space an inviting warmth.Peak View Place has one master suite with a king bed and private en-suite bedroom, as well as two bedrooms with queen beds that share access to a hall bathroom. If you’re on holiday with the kids or need more flexible accommodations, there’s also a bunk room with two twin bunk beds where the younger set can giggle the nights away.To give you the feeling of a honeymoon from everyday life, the villa offers ski-in, ski-out access to the Home Run ski run at Northstar, and is only a 10-minute drive from the resort’s base. For shopping and dining, make the 10-mile drive into downtown Truckee. And if you’ll be visiting during the summer, it’s less than a 10-mile drive to the nearest beach and the closest golf course.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.TOT # 123228

listing.listing_description: The city version of a traditional ski lodge, this downtown villa has all the mountain-style, and it’s walking distance to Park City’s Main Street. Size-up the ski slopes from the living room’s cozy leather sofa while you finish your espresso. Then, grab your gear from the ski storage area and head out. On your way, stop in to check out the latest gear at the boutique shops lining Main Street.Treasure Hollow’s trendy townhouse-layout gives each space a unique vibe and flow. The expertly organized kitchen and breakfast bar make tremendous use of their small space. From there, the dining area and double-sided fireplace lead the way to the living room, where the flat-screen TV sits above the mantle. And, the second living room downstairs is the perfect place for the kids to hang out.The Sunday Market in Park City is a great place to pick up some local produce and organic meat for the barbecue. After you’ve eaten, mix up a few festive cocktails at the wet bar gather in the living room to enjoy the view while you catch up with old friends. Later, move the party outside to the hot tub. In the warmer months, outdoor furniture adds another space to gather. And, the villa comes with 2 parking spots.With Main Street and the Sunday Market both within walking distance, you’ll have everything you need nearby. When it’s time to hit the slopes, Park City, Deer Valley, and Canyons Village are all with 5 miles of home. If there’s a golfer in the group, Park City Golf Course offers challenging fairways and dynamic landscapes, especially for those who haven’t been mountain-golfing yet.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Spot the sea from nearly every room at Family Tides. This La Jolla vacation rental is ideally located, close to several top attractions in the San Diego area, and thoughtfully designed, with sunset views and 4,300 square feet of living space. Its four bedrooms can welcome four couples on a beach getaway or a group of friends living out a California dream.This luxury property has both a front terrace where you can watch the waves with a cup of coffee or watch the sunset with a cocktail in hand, and a private back terrace where you can lounge by the pool and hot tub or sit down at the al-fresco dining table. After sunset, cozy up to the indoor fireplace and look to the TV and Wi-Fi for entertainment.Warm wood floors, crisp white walls and an open-concept layout tie the living spaces at Family Tides together. There are two sitting areas anchored by a fireplace and TV, a nautical-inspired dining area with ocean views and a fully equipped kitchen with a breakfast bar and its own views of the water.All four bedrooms at the villa have king beds and en-suite bathrooms, and three of them open directly to the terrace. Details like four-poster beds and vibrant textiles give each bedroom plenty of personality, and in the bathrooms, abundant marble lends a spa-like feel. The bedrooms can accommodate groups of up to twelve on holiday together.Family Tides is less than a 10-mile drive from some of the area’s best landmarks and attractions, from Mt. Soledad and the San Diego-La Jolla Underwater Park to the Torrey Pines Golf Course. Find one-of-a-kind items in the boutiques of Old Town San Diego, or sit down to a honeymoon-worthy dinner in a restaurant in this charmingly quaint neighborhood.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Enjoy a Mediterranean-style getaway in the shadow of California’s Santa Rosa Mountains at Cappella. Inspired by Mission architecture, this charming Desert Cities vacation rental has Old World elegance in a setting close to golf, shopping, dining and the Coachella festival grounds. Reserve this four-bedroom luxury property for a sunny holiday with extended family or a golf trip with friends.Soak in the desert sunshine (or relax in the cool of the shade) in the villa’s backyard, which features a pool and spillover spa, a terrace with loungers, a putting green and a firepit. A breezeway has a shaded sitting area, and the built-in outdoor kitchen has a barbecue, mini-fridge, sink and bar seating. You’ll find even more al-fresco living space on the second-floor balcony. If you’d prefer to entertain in the air conditioning, gather around the wet bar or grand piano for a memorable evening.The great room of Cappella opens to a courtyard with a sitting area via rows of french doors, creating an indoor-outdoor living space that feels seamless. In the open-plan living and dining areas and fully equipped kitchen, details such as vaulted and beamed ceilings, a stately fireplace surround and floor-length drapes create a sophisticated, European-inspired look.Cappella has three bedrooms with king beds, including the master suite and one with two queen beds; all four have private en-suite bathrooms. The master suite also has a sleeper sofa and rollaway double bed, perfect for a family traveling with younger children. A second king bedroom is located in an attached casita and could double as a honeymoon-style retreat.With six golf courses within 25 miles of the villa, Cappella is a golfer’s dream. If you’re not an avid player, browse the shops at nearby Old Town La Quinta, find shopping and dining in downtown Indio and Palm Desert, or take a day trip to Palm Springs or Joshua Tree National Park. Visitors in town for a music festival or tennis tournament will find the Coachella grounds less than a 10-minute drive away and Indian Wells less than 10 miles away.City ID # LIC-765166Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Tanager House is an extraordinary alpine chalet at Big Sky Resort, just steps from Natawista Run and a minute's drive from Moonlight Basin Clubhouse (which guests can enjoy at extra cost). Situated within the Silvertip enclave—named by Architectural Digest among the world's "most beautiful hotel cabins"—the villa combines rustic alpine charm with sleek modern lines and high-end amenities, including a superb gourmet kitchen and lovely open-air hot tub. Majestic mountain views of the Madison Range, including Lone Peak and the Spanish Peaks, create an inspiring atmosphere both indoors and on the ample deck. Three king bedrooms plus a kid-friendly bunk room accommodate up to ten guests, ideal for families and large groups of friends.The chalet's main living room features a high ceiling of pickled wood and ample mountain-view windows. Sumptuous sofas face the stone hearth with gas fireplace and mounted TV. The open floor plan leads gracefully to a granite dining table for ten and a gorgeous kitchen with granite countertops, beautiful wood cabinetry, and stainless steel appliances. Glass doors open from the living room to a spacious deck, ideal for barbeque grilling, sipping hot cocoa in the mountain air, or crawling into the hot tub for soothing relaxation.The master suite opens directly to the deck with hot tub and features a four-poster king bed, TV, and ensuite bathroom. The guestroom on the main level includes a king bed, private sitting area, TV, and access to a hallways bathroom. The upper level features another king guestroom with TV and desk. The kids' bunkroom includes two bunk beds (sleeping four in all) and a cozy lounge. Heating and air conditioning ensure comfort in all season.The chalet's private, one-car garage also serves a spacious storage room for skis, snowboards, bikes, and other equipment. Natawista Run is just steps away, and you're about a minute's walk from Moonlight Basin Clubhouse, which features a fitness center, outdoor pool, year-round outdoor sports offerings, and a fabulous Jack Nicklaus Signature Golf Course.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: The exclusive Beverly Hills 90210 zip code is one that needs no introduction and it is there, among the homes Hollywood’s elite, that you’ll find L.A. Villa. The stylish four-bedroom house was built by a renowned French architect and overflows with all the amenities you could want for a relaxing stay surrounded by the finer things in life.The pool terrace feels like your own private oasis as lush green gardens scale the walls, majestic palms tower upwards and decorative curtains billow in the breeze. In the corner a Grecian fountain brings calm to your surroundings as you recline on cushioned deck furniture and enjoy the California sun. An al fresco dining area provides the perfect spot for a delicious meal under the stars. Technology flows subtly through the villa, with a central audio system reaching all main areas, fast Wi-Fi connectivity and a phone system offering free long-distance calls.Inside, hand-picked Italian furniture and African antiques adorn the spacious open-concept main room, and are lit up by sunlight pouring in through a retractable glass wall. There you’ll find two living areas, back-to-back: one facing a beautiful fireplace and the other orientated towards a large flatscreen television. The gourmet kitchen also adds to the home’s cutting edge feel, with high-end appliances and smooth, stone countertops that make cooking a pleasure. Meals can be enjoyed around the picturesque dining room table that seats six or a charming breakfast table.Each of L.A. Villa’s bedrooms feature an en-suite bathroom with premium fixtures, plus air conditioning, hair dryer, entertainment system and phone. The Master and second bedrooms house spa-quality bathrooms with designer bathtubs and walk-in showers. The fourth bedroom is located in a lovely guest house with its own living room. Housekeeping service is available five days a week.When you’re ready to explore, you’ll find the best of Beverly Hills all less than ten minutes away, including the upscaled shops and restaurants of Rodeo Drive. There’s also golf, tennis courts and grocery stores nearby. In less than half an hour you can get to many of the city’s top attractions like Hollywood and downtown L.A. Beach lovers can head West for 35 minutes to Santa Monica or up the coast to Malibu.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.Registration number: HSR19-001803

listing.listing_description: Entertain family and friends in style in the balmy California weather at Clubhouse. This beautifully appointed vacation rental has an array of luxury amenities, more than 3,000 square feet of space and four bedrooms, divided between a main house and a casita. Its Indio location means it's only minutes to several golf courses, the Coachella festival grounds, Indian Wells and more.Clubhouse feels like your own private resort thanks to outdoor living areas with a pool, hot tub, putting green, a kitchenette with a barbecue and wine cooler, a firepit and fireplace, plus spaces for lounging, sitting and dining. The amenities continue inside, where you'll find a satellite TV, pool table and Wi-Fi.The villa's newly remodeled interiors pair mid-century influences with a contemporary open-concept layout. Catch up on the sleek gray velour sectional in the sitting area, perch on a robin's egg blue stool at the breakfast bar in the fully equipped gourmet kitchen, or gather everyone around the clean-lined dining table in wishbone-style chairs.The main house at Clubhouse features a master bedroom with a king bed and en-suite bathrooms, as well as two bedrooms with a queen bed and two twin beds, respectively, that share a bathroom. With its queen bed, en-suite bathroom, living area and kitchenette, the casita could be used as a honeymoon-style escape or a quiet retreat for in-laws.Whether you've come to the Desert Cities for a festival, sporting event or just a holiday in the sun, you're close to the action at Clubhouse. From the villa's location in a gated community, it's a 10-minute drive or less to three different golf courses, the Coachella festival grounds, the tennis at Indian Wells and downtown Indio. For a day trip, drive to Joshua Tree National Park for a look at the otherworldly landscape or downtown Palm Springs to discover its mid-century architectural gems.City ID # 20-00019908Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.
