listing.listing_description: This incredible slope side chalet allows you to experience everything Breckenridge has to offer – year round. Set at the base of Peak 8, this private condominium is just steps from the gondola that takes you to the ski slopes or right into town. Come experience the great outdoors in Colorado in an environment filled with almost unlimited options suitable for guests of all ages. Whether for a holiday or a honeymoon, book your stay at One Ski Hill 8413!During your stay at this vacation rental, you can spend time in the lobby with a large, three-sided fireplace or relax in the grand piano living room. The outdoor plaza seats up to 300 guests with a heated deck and fireplace. The aquatics center features an adult pool, children’s pool, indoor and outdoor hot tubs, sauna and steam room. Why not let the children bowl a few games at the two-lane alley while you visit the Rejuvenation Center for a soothing massage? One Ski Hill also features an exercise room, two movie lounges and a games room.This spacious condo has been beautifully appointed with distinctive, modern finishes. The kitchen features stainless steel Bosch appliances, a wine fridge and granite counter tops. Enjoy a meal in the formal dining area or a snack at the breakfast bar. Entertaining your group is easy in the living area where guests can warm up by the fireplace, read a book or watch television.The three comfortable bedrooms accommodate up to seven guests at this non-smoking villa. The master suite offers a king bed, gas fireplace, sitting area and flat screen television. The second bedroom has a queen bed as well as a sitting area and flat screen television. Ideal for the children, the third bedroom has a captain’s bunk, a flat screen television and an Xbox 360 game system.While winters bring some of the best skiing opportunities to Breckenridge, summer activities at the Peak 8 Fun Park include the Gold Runner Coaster, the Alpine SuperSlide, miniature golf, bungee trampolines and a rock climbing wall. Your reservation also includes a free shuttle that will take you and your family anywhere in town for dining, shopping and nightlife. You’ll also find the Breckenridge Golf Club just a few minutes away.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Spacious, stylish and close to almost everything, Paramount is tops for a Desert Cities holiday. Set behind the gates of an exclusive community in Indio, this chic five-bedroom vacation rental is a private retreat that’s just minutes from shopping, dining, golf and more. Reserve a stay with friends for the Coachella festival or tennis at Indian Wells, or with a group of extended family for a laid-back California getaway.Spend your stay relaxing or entertaining in the resort-worthy backyard, which features a swimming pool, hot tub, lounging and dining areas, a barbecue and a firepit. Or head inside after sunset, pour a glass from the wine fridge and enjoy the media room, fireplace and Wi-Fi.Taking inspiration from the area’s rich tradition of mid-century modern style, the villa’s open-concept great room pops with color, from the tomato-red sectional in the sitting area to the matching stools at the breakfast bar in the fully equipped kitchen. There’s also a breakfast nook in the kitchen, as well as a separate formal dining room that seats eight.There are four bedrooms in the main house at Paramount and one in a guest house. In the main house, you’ll find two bedrooms with California king beds and en-suite bathrooms, including the master suite, one bedroom with a bunk bed and twin bed, and one bedroom with a full bunk bed and twin bed. The two bunk rooms share a bathroom. And with a king bed, en-suite bathroom and terrace, the guest house gives couples the luxury of honeymoon-style privacy.The villa is 5 miles or less from several golf courses, shopping and dining at charming Old Town La Quinta, the Coachella festival grounds and Indian Wells Tennis Garden, and 10 miles or less from even more golf courses and Palm Desert.City ID # 20-00021226Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Champagne Dream is a stunning four-bedroom villa that seamlessly blends the mid-century Palm Springs aesthetic with crisp, modern lines. Hidden in the historic Deepwell area, a quick tour around this central neighborhood will reveal glamour and style which drew Hollywood’s elite to the desert.Palm Springs design is known for blurring the lines between indoor and outdoor living, and the property’s immense pool terrace is a prime example. Activities and amenities are anchored around a sleek saline pool and bubbling spa. Bronze yourself to perfection on a reclining chaise longue before seeking shelter under covered areas on the north side of the pool. A cabana shelters an al fresco dining table, where you can savor feasts prepared on the gas grill. A stylish lounge set sits at the other end, allowing you and your guests to enjoy cocktails mixed at the nearby wet bar, as flames flicker from an elevated fire pit.Cool porcelain tiles line the great room’s spacious common areas. Each section features a pocket glass door leading outside. Exposed beam ceilings and a stacked stone fireplace pay homage to the villa’s modernist origins. The two-sided fireplace casts a warming glow towards anyone relaxing on the living room sofas or watching a movie in the media room. Test your culinary skills in the gourmet kitchen where you’ll find a high-end cooktop and a unique appliance garage, keeping smaller machines discretely hidden. Up to eight people can gather at the regency dining table, where faux-stag busts hold court at either end.Champagne Dream’s four beautifully-appointed bedrooms are bright, airy and tastefully decorated. They are all air conditioned, boast king size beds and open onto the patio. The large Master bedroom has a stunning en-suite bathroom with premium fixtures, dual vanities and walk-in shower. The recently constructed casita shares a wall with the rest of the house, but is only accessible by its patio entrance, making it a perfectly private miniature residence for teenagers.When you’re ready to explore, it’s just a five minute drive to historic Palm Canyon Drive, known as, “the strip”. There you’ll find an eclectic mix of shops, restaurants, cafés and art galleries, including incredible treasure troves of mid-century modern antiques. You can also relax at some of the world’s best spas, including Rancho Las Palmas and La Quinta. Golfers have over 80 lush courses to choose from in the Coachella Valley.Palm Springs Registered Tax Number: 3031Palm Springs City ID: 3850Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Quartz Mountain is a fabulous Paradise Valley villa outside Scottsdale, situated just two minutes on foot from the famed Paradise Valley Country Club. The newly built, 7,000-square-foot home enjoys breathtaking views of Camelback Mountain, while its impressive amenities include a large outdoor swimming pool and hot tub, indoor and outdoor kitchens, and an excellent home office. With a superb master suite and six ample guestrooms with queen beds, Quartz Mountain is an ideal choice for families, corporate retreats, destination wedding guests, and golf vacations with friends.The villa's outdoor living areas inspire festive occasions or tranquil relaxation in the dreamy desert air. Savor a refreshing dip in the swimming pool and sunbathe on lounge chairs on the terrace. Fire up the grill for an afternoon barbeque, and dine alfresco in the mellowing light. Sip wine and cocktails by the fire pit at sunset, and relish a soak in the hot tub under the spectacular stars.The villa’s interiors are beautifully designed to create a graceful flow of space between rooms. The living room features a large, flat-screen TV, a fireplace, and comfortable seating under lovely wood ceiling beams. Gourmets will adore the capacious kitchen, featuring expansive prep space, top-of-the-line appliances, a long bar, an attached service kitchen, a wine and cocktail niche, a large pantry, and a casual dining table for eight. The elegant formal dining room features a table for ten under gorgeous chandeliers, a salon area with fireplace, and doors to a patio with fountain. The villa also features a fitness room and cozy media room, and there is air conditioning throughout.The lovely master suite includes a king bed, walk-in closet, and ensuite bathroom with stand-alone steam shower and deluxe vanity. Each of the six guestrooms features a queen bed and ensuite bathroom.In addition to being just steps from Paradise Valley Country Club, the villa is within five to ten minutes by car from several world-class resorts and sport clubs, including Camelback Golf Club, The Phoenician, and Camelback Village Racquet and Health Club. Scottsdale is only six miles away, and you're a short drive from Echo Canyon Recreation Area. Downtown Phoenix is about thirteen miles away.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: The decorative cattle skull is the only Old-West touch in this clean-lined model of New West living just outside downtown Austin. Palm trees around the pool terrace (and palm-print wallpaper) lend a resort feel, while the restaurant-grade range will make you feel like a pro chef. Bring your bathing suit on the 2-minute drive to Zilker Park, whose 358 acres include the 3-acre Barton Springs Pool. Spend sunny days outside on the private backyard deck, which features a row of loungers, alfresco dining for 6, and a barbecue, and which is edged by a lap pool. After a day out in the city’s galleries or on the golf course, cozy up to the wood-burning fireplace, switch on the cable TV, face off against friends and family across the ping-pong table, or check in from your holiday via Wi-Fi. A glass wall and vaulted ceiling bring light and air into the white-walled living room, where a sofa and lounge chairs sit atop a natural-fiber area rug. There’s banquette seating around a mod Tulip table in an adjacent breakfast nook, as well as a breakfast bar fronting the professional-grade range in the fully equipped kitchen. This vacation rental has 2 bedrooms with ensuite bathrooms: a master suite with a king bed and terrace, and a second bedroom with 2 twin beds. There’s also 1 bedroom with a queen bed and 2 bedrooms with 2 queen beds each, all 3 of which have shared hall-bathroom access. A stay at the villa gives you the luxury of a quiet setting along with easy access to the city’s hot spots. Take a honeymoon from the everyday in Zilker Park, capped off with a swim in spring-fed Barton Springs Pool. Or take a free tour of the Texas Capitol building, just under 5 miles away, followed by a concert or cocktail at one of the venues, bars, and restaurants downtown. Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Choose ideal accommodation for your stay at the famed Olympic Valley with this comfortable and excellently-furnished option. Ideal for groups looking to ski the slopes of this Winter Olympics-hosting resort, settle into the comfortable living room, modern kitchen, top-tier bathroom and mountain view balcony. Close to the action and located in the lively resort, Lake Tahoe is a 15-minute drive.This convenient option instantly welcomes guests with its warm and pleasant fireplace, creating a cosy atmosphere after a chilly afternoon on the ski-runs that rise over the town. Guests can make the most of the shining and modern kitchen, which comes totally equipped with modern appliances. In-house AC ensures that guests will be perfectly comfortable as they relax in the plush and pleasant living space, while touches of the culture and animals of the high Sierras are everywhere, from paintings of the West’s wildlife to sculptures and fixtures that recall the West’s diverse fauna. From the balcony, guests can take in the streets of the resort itself, and gaze out on the forested slopes of this renowned skiing community.Being located in the ski village, it doesn’t get any better for skiers in the group. The locality offers a range of mature and excellent dining options, from American-fare eateries to more nuanced European options. The stunning landscape around Olympic Valley belies how close the resort is to other settlements, with the shore of crystalline Lake Tahoe being a mere 15-minute drive away, including the excellent public beaches of the locality. Fantastic outdoor options abound in the nearby wilderness, from hill-walking and mountain biking, to snow machine outings in Winter. Close by, the charming mountain town of Truckee to the north makes for a great day out.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Enjoy the majestic Rockies and the classic Breckenridge ambience in a brand-new way at Three Sisters Lookout. Perched on Baldy Mountain, this recently built luxury villa is a private retreat that looks down on the town and across to the slopes of the Ten Mile Range—a stunning vista any time of year. Four bedrooms and cozy modern lodge-inspired interiors make this Colorado vacation rental a spacious setting for a family holiday or the perfect backdrop for a secluded, away-from-it-all honeymoon.Start each day by catching the free public shuttle, located only two blocks away, that brings you to the ski lifts. After a day on the slopes, leave your gear in the villa’s mud room and take a soak in the hot tub or have a drink from the wet bar by the fireplace. In warmer weather, you can prep dinner on the barbecue and enjoy it at the dining area on the deck overlooking the mountains.Three Sisters Lookout represents classic mountain style rendered in luxurious modern finishes and sprawling layouts worthy of the Western setting. Cathedral ceilings and a two-story stone fireplace soar in the open-plan great room, where leather sofas and dining chairs add rich tones and soft texture. A second sitting area has its own stone fireplace and leather sofa in a more intimate space. Not only does the fully equipped kitchen have a breakfast bar and state-of-the-art appliances, it features a double oven to make light work of meals.For accommodations, the villa has everything from hotel-worthy suite-style bedrooms to kid-friendly bunk rooms. There are two bedrooms with king beds and en-suite bathrooms, including the master suite, which also has a jetted tub. Another bedroom has a queen bed and access to a shared bathroom. For kids, there’s a bedroom with a twin bunk bed and an en-suite bathroom, a space with two twin beds and a shared bathroom or a cozy nook where they can nestle up in two built-in twin beds.The fastest way to the slopes from Three Sisters Lookout is to make the 2-minute walk to the public shuttle stop or drive the 4 miles to the lifts. If you have some time in the area, you can also make the 21-mile drive to fresh trails at Copper Mountain. In the evenings, head to downtown Breckenridge, 3.5 miles away, for restaurants and shopping, or take the family skating at the town’s ice arena, about 3 miles away. Book your tickets into Eagle County Regional Airport, 74 miles from the villa, or Denver International Airport, 107 miles away.Copyright © 2016 Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Escape to the wilderness of the Spanish Peaks at this scenic ski lodge in Big Sky, Montana. Gaze upon the imposing views of Lone Peak from the comfort of a plush leather sofa. Let the Fan Mountian range inspire you while rejuvenating in the hot tub. And, warm up by the wood-burning fire after a day on the slopes. Later, drive 7 miles to Big Sky’s town center for a steak dinner at Horn and Cantle.Decorated with towering evergreens, exposed wood, and natural stone, Hoos View encapsulates the rugged essence of Montana. The kitchen’s breakfast bar is the perfect place to sip coffee and plan out an exciting day. When you get home, throw your wet gear in the ski storage room, and make sure to use the boot warmers. Then gather in the great room to tell tales over a hot chocolate or something from the wet bar.On quiet nights in, throw the big game on the satellite, catch a flick with the family, or organize a shuffleboard tournament. In the warmer months, skip the steakhouse and pick up your own cuts from the local butcher for a backyard barbecue. Enjoy your meal amongst the mountain views at the alfresco set. Later, get a fire going in the fire pit and gather around for some smores.With ski access just 5 minutes from home, you’ll be able to carve the slopes of Big Sky bright and early each morning. In the summer, golf in Montana is an incredibly scenic way to take in the landscapes. After your round, stop into the Moonlight Basin Clubhouse for lunch. Then, head into town to try out some craft beers at Lone Peak Taproom or Beehive Basin Brewery.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Spend your ski holiday in one of the most coveted neighborhoods in Breckenridge at Highlands Hideaway. This spacious five-bedroom home occupies a tree-lined lot in The Highlands with views of the Arapahoe National Forest. It’s only a few miles from Main Street and the gondola and just steps from hiking and biking trails, and with private seasonal shuttle service, exploring the area is a breeze.In the summer, watch the stars appear over the mountains from a beautifully appointed stone patio with a barbecue, outdoor fireplace and al-fresco dining for eight. When there’s snow on the peaks, finish the day with a soak in the private outdoor hot tub or relax indoors in a lower-level entertainment area with a wet bar and kitchenette.Warm, welcoming interiors designed by Suzanne Allen Guerra feature custom finishes and inviting open-concept layouts. The heart of the home is an expansive great room anchored by a stone fireplace and cozy sitting area at one end and a fully equipped kitchen at the other. In between, vaulted beamed ceilings and hardwood floors are the backdrop for a dining area that seats ten.This luxury vacation rental has three bedrooms with en-suite bathrooms: two with queen beds and fireplaces, and one with two twin-over-queen bunk beds. The other two bedrooms have a queen bed and a queen bunk bed, respectively, and share a hall bathroom. Together, the five bedrooms can accommodate up to sixteen friends and family members.Whether you want a laid-back honeymoon from real life or an active Colorado adventure, Highlands Hideaway delivers. Spend your stay spotting the birds and foxes in the forest around the villa, or take advantage of nearby golf, hiking, biking and cultural activities like the Breckenridge Oktoberfest. Skiers will appreciate easy access to the BreckConnect gondola and Copper Mountain, while younger guests won’t want to miss out on sledding and tubing at the town’s Carter Park.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: This exquisite mountain villa is located on Camas Loop within the prestigious Elkhorn Community near Sun Valley Resort, with access to the community’s swimming pools, tennis club, and spa facilities. The home features ample, wrap-around terraces with alfresco dining and sublime sunset and sunrise views, including a breathtaking prospect of Bald Mountain, while its superbly appointed interiors include high-end media features, three fireplaces, and a gourmet kitchen. A deluxe master suite and two ample guest suites accommodate families and groups of friends up to six in size.The modern home blends vintage Rocky Mountain charm with superb contemporary comforts and gallery-worthy artwork. The large living room features high, vaulted ceilings of exposed natural wood, a beautiful stone hearth with wood-burning fireplace, and expansive windows that flood the home with alpine light. There is an interior dining table for eight as well as alfresco dining on the expansive deck. The open kitchen will inspire the gourmets among your party, with chef-grade appliances, generous prep space, a wine fridge, and a breakfast bar. Heating and air conditioning keep you comfortable in all seasons, and there is a home office for work or study.The bedrooms offer lovely private havens for cozy downtime and rest. The master suite includes a king bed, walk-in closet, fireplace, and ensuite bathroom with shower and jetted tub. The two guestrooms share a bathroom between them: one includes a king bed and walk-in closet, while the other has a queen bed.The Elkhorn Community offers an ideal location for enjoying the unique riches of Sun Valley. Play golf at Elkhorn Golf Club, enjoy the community's pools and tennis courts in the summer, and soothe your muscles in the sauna and steam room. Beyond Elkhorn, you’re just six minutes from Dollar Mountain, eight minutes from Bald Mountain, and four miles from River Run at Sun Valley Resort—easily accessible by car or the free shuttle service. Downtown Ketchum is about four miles away, where you'll find superb dining, Magic Lantern Cinemas, and much more.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Silver Star 41 is fabulous luxury villa located within a year-round alpine playground of Park City. Here, you can ski and snowboard to your heart’s content, while other activity options include winter fly-fishing, hot-air ballooning, snowmobiling, sleigh rides and snow tubing. During the warmer months at Park City, options include zip tours, golf, mountain biking, hiking and horseback riding, to name but a few. Have your vacation, your way with Luxury Retreats!The outdoor perks at this stunning vacation rental include a private hot tub, barbeque and wet bar. This private holiday home has been loaded with perks such as an espresso machine, satellite television, Wi-Fi and an elevator. Guests will enjoy complimentary access to the five-star amenities of the Silver Star Community including a heated swimming pool, a hot tub, exercise room, cafe and fire pits. Your reservation includes light housekeeping and complimentary shared shuttle service during the winter.Contemporary, plush and pastel furnishings in the media room offer some real moments to unwind. The formal dining area is casual and comfortable. If you have any special news to share this year, why not do so over a sumptuous meal? The fully equipped kitchen features a breakfast bar, stainless steel appliances and plenty of counter space. Or perhaps it’s just time to curl up with a fresh drink and a good book by the fireplace in the living room?Four immaculate bedrooms accommodate up to twelve guests at this non-smoking villa. All of the bedrooms feature en-suite bathrooms and televisions. The master suite offers a king size bed and a dual shower. You will find another king bed in one suite and two queen beds in another. The bunk room is sure to be a hit with children!Whether you have come to Utah to ski or golf, you will find everything you require within close reach of this breathtaking chalet. The Park City Golf Club and plenty of options for nature walks and hiking are within easy reach. In the summer, look for outdoor concerts at the magnificent Snow Park Outdoor Amphitheater. Whether for a family holiday, a couples’ retreat or special events such as a wedding or anniversary, get the alpine getaway you deserve!Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Festival-goers, golf fanatics and sun-seekers will find plenty to love at Lawrence Estate. Only minutes from the Coachella grounds, several golf courses and outdoor shopping and dining at picturesque Old Town La Quinta, this luxury Desert Cities vacation rental is large enough to host the whole family or a group of friends. For guests who just want to soak in the California sun, there’s a gorgeous outdoor living area.Step through the gates of Lawrence Estate to discover a private backyard with a heated pool, hot tub, and lounging and sitting areas in both shade and sun. Sip refreshments from the wet bar, play lawn games, heat up the barbecue, enjoy dinner at the al-fresco table and linger into the evening around the firepit or outdoor fireplace. Inside, a premium sound system and games room with shuffleboard, foosball and ping-pong will provide hours of fun for kids and grown-ups alike.The villa’s tiled roof, stucco exterior and single-story layout have classic Southwestern charm. But inside, you’ll find bright, airy rooms with mod flair. The open-plan living room, dining room and fully equipped kitchen encourage guests to gather in the same space and spend quality time together. Details like brass light fixtures, a plush Beni Ourain–style rug, iconic Round dining chairs and beautiful stone backsplash tiles invite a closer look.There are four bedrooms in the main house at Lawrence Estate and one in the guest house. In the main house, there are two bedrooms with king beds and en-suite bathrooms, including a master suite that opens to the terrace. Parents on holiday with children will want to claim the other two bedrooms, which each have a queen bed and share a bathroom. The guest house, with its king bed and en-suite bathroom, could be used as a secluded honeymoon suite or tranquil retreat for the in-laws.The villa’s location in Indio puts you close to music festivals, the Empire Polo Club and Indian Wells Tennis Garden, and a concierge can help arrange event tickets. They are also happy to help with tee times at one of the nearby country clubs or dinner reservations at local restaurants. For a memorable day trip, drive to Palm Springs and admire the mid-century architecture, take in the views from the Mount San Jacinto tramway or marvel at the otherworldly scenery in Joshua Tree National Park.City ID # 18-00023058Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: The namesake slope rises above the terrace at this traditional-on-the-outside, contemporary-on-the-inside Beverly Hills retreat. Its palm-lined drive and red-tiled roof speak to classic California style, while a massive stone fireplace makes a statement in the great room. While a cul-de-sac setting makes for a quiet stay, it’s less than 10 miles to Rodeo Drive, Universal Studios, and more. Mature landscaping makes the sunny terrace and curving pool feel like a private hideaway. There’s also a barbecue and a shaded al-fresco dining area for serving whatever you’ve grilled up. Finish the evening with a soak in the outdoor hot tub, a drink from the indoor wet bar, a favorite show on the smart TV, or a scroll through all your feeds via Wi-Fi. The mass of the double-sided stone fireplace echoes that of the mountain, bringing the landscape indoors to separate the two living rooms. A round dining table has seating for eight friends or family members, and there’s also a breakfast bar in the fully equipped kitchen along with stainless steel appliances. This luxury property has one master bedroom with a king bed, en-suite bathroom, and honeymoon-suite-worthy details such as a jetted tub and its own lounge area. There are also three bedrooms with queen beds: two that share a bathroom, and one that shares access to a hall bathroom. While the villa feels tucked away, a holiday at this vacation rental puts you within easy reach of some of L.A.’s most iconic attractions, whether the boutiques of Rodeo Drive or the world-class collection of the Getty Center. Catch a concert at the Hollywood Bowl or, if you’re traveling with the kids, treat them to a day at Universal Studios. With three beaches within 25 miles, you can take a day trip to play in the sand or try out surfing. Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.
